verses.verse: Now Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> the Gileadite <S%H1569><s%> was a mighty man <S%H1368><s%> of valor <S%H2428><s%>, and he was the son <S%H1121><s%> of a harlot <S%H802><s%>: and Gilead <S%H1568><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Jephthah <S%H3316><s%>.

And Gilead <S%H1568><s%>'s wife <S%H802><s%> bare <S%H3205><s%> him sons <S%H1121><s%>; and when his wife <S%H802><s%>'s sons <S%H1121><s%> grew up <S%H1431><s%>, they drove out <S%H1644><s%> Jephthah <S%H3316><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H5157><s%>, Thou shalt not inherit in our father <S%H1><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%>; for thou art the son <S%H1121><s%> of another <S%H312><s%> woman <S%H802><s%>.

Then Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> fled <S%H1272><s%> from <S%H6440><s%> his brethren <S%H251><s%>, and dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Tob <S%H2897><s%>: and there were gathered <S%H3950><s%> vain <S%H7386><s%> fellows <S%H582><s%> to Jephthah <S%H3316><s%>, and they went out with him <S%H3318><s%>.
And it came to pass after a while <S%H3117><s%>, that the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> made war <S%H3898><s%> against Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And it was so <S%H1121><s%>, that, when the children of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> made war <S%H3898><s%> against Israel <S%H3478><s%>, the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> to fetch <S%H3947><s%> Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Tob <S%H2897><s%>;
and they said <S%H559><s%> unto Jephthah <S%H3316><s%>, Come <S%H3212><s%> and be our chief <S%H7101><s%>, that we may fight <S%H3898><s%> with the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%>.

And Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%>, Did not ye hate <S%H8130><s%> me <S%H1644><s%>, and drive me out of my father <S%H1><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%>? and why are ye come <S%H935><s%> unto me now when ye are in distress <S%H6887><s%>?

And the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Jephthah <S%H3316><s%>, Therefore are we turned again <S%H7725><s%> to thee now <S%H1980><s%>, that thou mayest go with us <S%H3898><s%>, and fight with the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%>; and thou shalt be our head <S%H7218><s%> over all the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%>.

And Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%>, If ye bring me home again <S%H7725><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> with the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%>, and Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> deliver <S%H5414><s%> them before <S%H6440><s%> me <S%H7218><s%>, shall I be your head?

And the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Jephthah <S%H3316><s%>, Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> shall be witness <S%H8085><s%> between us <S%H1697><s%>; surely according to thy word so will we do <S%H6213><s%>.

Then Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> with the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%>, and the people <S%H5971><s%> made <S%H7760><s%> him head <S%H7218><s%> and chief <S%H7101><s%> over them <S%H3316><s%>: and Jephthah spake <S%H1696><s%> all his words <S%H1697><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> in Mizpah <S%H4709><s%>.

And Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> unto the king <S%H4428><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, What hast thou to do with me <S%H935><s%>, that thou art come unto me to fight <S%H3898><s%> against my land <S%H776><s%>?

And the king <S%H4428><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> answered <S%H559><s%> unto the messengers <S%H4397><s%> of Jephthah <S%H3316><s%>, Because Israel <S%H3478><s%> took away <S%H3947><s%> my land <S%H776><s%>, when he came up <S%H5927><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, from the Arnon <S%H769><s%> even unto the Jabbok <S%H2999><s%>, and unto the Jordan <S%H3383><s%>: now therefore restore those lands again <S%H7725><s%> peaceably <S%H7965><s%>.
And Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> unto the king <S%H4428><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%>;

and he said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H559><s%>, Thus saith Jephthah <S%H3316><s%>: Israel <S%H3478><s%> took not away <S%H3947><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>, nor the land <S%H776><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%>,

but when they came up <S%H5927><s%> from Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and Israel <S%H3478><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> through the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> unto the Red <S%H5488><s%> Sea <S%H3220><s%>, and came <S%H935><s%> to Kadesh <S%H6946><s%>;

then Israel <S%H3478><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> unto the king <S%H4428><s%> of Edom <S%H123><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Let me <S%H5674><s%>, I pray thee, pass through thy land <S%H776><s%>; but the king <S%H4428><s%> of Edom <S%H123><s%> hearkened <S%H8085><s%> not <S%H7971><s%>. And in like manner he sent unto the king <S%H4428><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>; but he would <S%H14><s%> not <S%H3478><s%>: and Israel abode <S%H3427><s%> in Kadesh <S%H6946><s%>.

Then they went through <S%H3212><s%> the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, and went around <S%H5437><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Edom <S%H123><s%>, and the land <S%H776><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>, and came <S%H935><s%> by the east side <S%H4217><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>, and they encamped <S%H2583><s%> on the other side <S%H5676><s%> of the Arnon <S%H769><s%>; but they came <S%H935><s%> not within the border <S%H1366><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>, for the Arnon <S%H769><s%> was the border <S%H1366><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>.

And Israel <S%H3478><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> unto Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, the king <S%H4428><s%> of Heshbon <S%H2809><s%>; and Israel <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H5674><s%>, Let us pass, we pray thee <S%H776><s%>, through thy land unto <S%H5704><s%> my place <S%H4725><s%>.

But Sihon <S%H5511><s%> trusted <S%H539><s%> not Israel <S%H3478><s%> to pass <S%H5674><s%> through his border <S%H1366><s%>; but Sihon <S%H5511><s%> gathered <S%H622><s%> all his people <S%H5971><s%> together <S%H622><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Jahaz <S%H3096><s%>, and fought <S%H3898><s%> against Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, delivered <S%H5414><s%> Sihon <S%H5511><s%> and all his people <S%H5971><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and they smote <S%H5221><s%> them <S%H3478><s%>: so Israel possessed <S%H3423><s%> all the land <S%H776><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of that country <S%H776><s%>.

And they possessed <S%H3423><s%> all the border <S%H1366><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, from the Arnon <S%H769><s%> even unto the Jabbok <S%H2999><s%>, and from the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> even unto the Jordan <S%H3383><s%>.

So now Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, hath dispossessed <S%H3423><s%> the Amorites <S%H567><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and shouldest thou possess them <S%H3423><s%>?

Wilt not thou possess <S%H3423><s%> that which Chemosh <S%H3645><s%> thy god <S%H430><s%> giveth thee to possess <S%H3423><s%>? So whomsoever Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> hath dispossessed <S%H3423><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> us <S%H3423><s%>, them will we possess.

And now art thou anything better <S%H2896><s%> than Balak <S%H1111><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zippor <S%H6834><s%>, king <S%H4428><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>? did he ever <S%H7378><s%> strive <S%H7378><s%> against Israel <S%H3478><s%>, or did he ever <S%H7378><s%> fight against them <S%H3898><s%>?

While Israel <S%H3478><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in Heshbon <S%H2809><s%> and its towns <S%H1323><s%>, and in Aroer <S%H6177><s%> and its towns <S%H1323><s%>, and in all the cities <S%H5892><s%> that are along by the side <S%H3027><s%> of the Arnon <S%H769><s%>, three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>; wherefore did ye not recover <S%H5337><s%> them within that time <S%H6256><s%>?

I therefore have not sinned <S%H2398><s%> against thee <S%H6213><s%>, but thou doest me wrong <S%H7451><s%> to war <S%H3898><s%> against me <S%H3068><s%>: Jehovah, the Judge <S%H8199><s%>, be judge <S%H8199><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> between the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%>.
Howbeit the king <S%H4428><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> hearkened <S%H8085><s%> not unto the words <S%H1697><s%> of Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> which he sent him <S%H7971><s%>.

Then the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> came upon Jephthah <S%H3316><s%>, and he passed over <S%H5674><s%> Gilead <S%H1568><s%> and Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>, and passed over <S%H5674><s%> Mizpeh <S%H4708><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%>, and from Mizpeh <S%H4708><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%> he passed over <S%H5674><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%>.

And Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> vowed <S%H5087><s%> a vow <S%H5088><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, If thou wilt indeed <S%H5414><s%> deliver <S%H5414><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> into my hand <S%H3027><s%>,

then it shall be <S%H3318><s%>, that whatsoever cometh forth <S%H3318><s%> from the doors <S%H1817><s%> of my house <S%H1004><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> me <S%H7725><s%>, when I return in peace <S%H7965><s%> from the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%>, it shall be Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>'s, and I will offer it up <S%H5927><s%> for a burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%>.

So Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> passed over <S%H5674><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> against them <S%H3068><s%>; and Jehovah delivered <S%H5414><s%> them into his hand <S%H3027><s%>.

And he smote <S%H5221><s%> them from Aroer <S%H6177><s%> until thou come <S%H935><s%> to Minnith <S%H4511><s%>, even twenty <S%H6242><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%>, and unto <S%H58><s%> Abel-cheramim <S%H3754><s%>, with a very <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> slaughter <S%H4347><s%>. So the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> were subdued <S%H3665><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to Mizpah <S%H4709><s%> unto his house <S%H1004><s%>; and <S%H1323><s%>, behold, his daughter came out <S%H3318><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> him with timbrels <S%H8596><s%> and with dances <S%H4246><s%>: and she was his only child <S%H3173><s%>; besides her he had neither son <S%H1121><s%> nor <S%H176><s%> daughter <S%H1323><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H7200><s%>, when he saw her <S%H7167><s%>, that he rent his clothes <S%H899><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, Alas <S%H162><s%>, my daughter <S%H1323><s%>! thou hast brought <S%H3766><s%> me very <S%H3766><s%> low <S%H3766><s%>, and thou art one of them that trouble <S%H5916><s%> me <S%H6475><s%>; for I have opened my mouth <S%H6310><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and I cannot <S%H3201><s%> go back <S%H7725><s%>.

And she said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H1><s%>, My father, thou hast opened <S%H6475><s%> thy mouth <S%H6310><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; do <S%H6213><s%> unto me according to that which <S%H834><s%> hath proceeded <S%H3318><s%> out of thy mouth <S%H6310><s%>, forasmuch <S%H310><s%> as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath taken <S%H6213><s%> vengeance <S%H5360><s%> for thee on thine enemies <S%H341><s%>, even on the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%>.

And she said <S%H559><s%> unto her father <S%H1><s%>, Let this thing <S%H1697><s%> be done <S%H6213><s%> for me <S%H7503><s%>: let me alone two <S%H8147><s%> months <S%H2320><s%>, that I may depart <S%H3212><s%> and go down <S%H3381><s%> upon the mountains <S%H2022><s%>, and bewail <S%H1058><s%> my virginity <S%H1331><s%>, I and my companions <S%H7464><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%>, Go <S%H3212><s%>. And he sent her away <S%H7971><s%> for two <S%H8147><s%> months <S%H2320><s%>: and she departed <S%H3212><s%>, she and her companions <S%H7464><s%>, and bewailed <S%H1058><s%> her virginity <S%H1331><s%> upon the mountains <S%H2022><s%>.

And it came to pass at the end <S%H7093><s%> of two <S%H8147><s%> months <S%H2320><s%>, that she returned <S%H7725><s%> unto her father <S%H1><s%>, who did <S%H6213><s%> with her according to his vow <S%H5088><s%> which he had vowed <S%H5087><s%>: and she knew <S%H3045><s%> not man <S%H376><s%>. And it was a custom <S%H2706><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%>,

that the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> yearly <S%H3117><s%> to celebrate <S%H8567><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> the Gileadite <S%H1569><s%> four <S%H702><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> in a year <S%H8141><s%>.
